LZRFY.summary: Localiza Rent a Car S.A. engages in car rental and franchising activities. The company is also involved in selling decommissioned cars; providing car parking services; and managing car-related claims for insurance companies. As of September 30, 2020, it operated a fleet of 279,885 cars; and 603 car rental locations in Brazil and internationally. The company serves individuals, legal entities, and corporations. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Belo Horizonte, Brazil.

In addition, the company sells used cars through its stores. As of December 31, 2019 it operated 258 stores comprising 191 car rental stores and 67 used car stores, as well as a fleet of 109,661 vehicles. It has strategic alliance with Avis Budget Car Rental, LLC. The company was formerly known as H.L.C.S.P.E Empreendimentos e ParticipaÃ§Ãµes S.A. and changed its name to Movida ParticipaÃ§Ãµes S.A. in December 29, 2014.
